mapper.insert: insert into recharge_notify_request (service, sign_type, sign, mer_id, version, order_id, mer_date, trade_no, mer_check_date, balance, com_amt, ret_code, ret_msg, request_time, request_data) values (#{service}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{orderId}, #{merDate}, #{tradeNo}, #{merCheckDate}, #{balance}, #{comAmt}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{requestTime}, #{requestData})

insert into recharge_notify_response (request_id, sign_type, mer_id, version, order_id, mer_date, ret_code, response_data, response_time) values (#{requestId}, #{signType}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{orderId}, #{merDate}, #{retCode}, #{responseData}, #{responseTime})
